name: Entrenos Desabi
description: Entrenos Desabi was the first web project I developed. Ramón and Ricardo joined me to design and create a complete app to make training sessions for Desabi.

name: Score
description: Score is a generic score developed for the Android platform. It was my first Android app which was uploaded to the Play Store.

name: Verdad o Mentira
description:
Verdad o Mentira is an Android app which I developed only in two days. The objectivo of this development was to learn how to add publicity and monetize an Android app.

Although it was really easy to develop, this app was quite succesful and reached almost 20.000 downloads until January 2016.

name: Electrónica Losdel
description:
This was the first web project I did all by myself. Electrónica Losdel wanted an easy web to solve their lack of visibility on the web.

Although I didn't need to use a backend technology, I did. I used the PHP framework called CodeIgniter because I wanted to learn how to work with a framework and I had time to.

It was a good experience beacuse I learned how to use a backend framework and, also, I applied some digital marketing techniques to raise the SEO of this webpage.

name: WePlay Web
description: WePlay web fue la primera parte del proyecto fin de máster que presenté, junto a mis compañeros Lien y Adrián, ante la Universidad Politécnica de Madrid. Este proyecto supuso un primer contacto completo con Symfony2 y MongoDB. Además, hicimos una adaptación de la metodología SCRUM para poder compenetrarnos lo mejor posible y realizar el proyecto a tiempo, sin dejar de lado la flexibilidad ante los cambios que nos iba indicando nuestro cliente, el profesor.

name: WePlay Mobile
description: Aplicación Android presentada como Proyecto Fin de Máster junto con mis compañeros Adrián y Lien. Con esta parte, completamos el proyecto. Gracias a la implementación de servicios REST en la parte web, conseguimos reproducir los datos en la aplicación móvil.

name: Certify Legal
description: This web app was a certification form creator for buildings. The are no resources of this project because of the customer's confidenciality agreement.

name: MCR
description: This web app is a complete online shop for MCR Infoelectronics, the enterprise where I'm currently working.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio made to show the projects I've done, my skills, ....
